Japan Blog 00

November 13, 2017
This is it. Tonight is my last full night within the United States, at least for the next week. As of Wednesday morning, I will touch down at Narita International Airport. Which, if you didn’t know, is in Tokyo, Japan.

I'm Jacob. I'm a Front-End Developer at Elegant Seagulls in Marquette, Michigan. With a keen eye for detail and a passion for quality assurance, I deliver products that adapt to all modern screen sizes and browsers. You can view some of my current and past open source projects on GitHub.

I travel in my free time when I can. Within the past year, I've been to Tokyo, Japan and Iceland. With plans to one day return to Japan, I'm studying two components of Japanese, Hiragana and Kanji. Soon enough, I'll get around to the third component, Katakana. I also am learning Russian when I have the time.
